summary: A young boy's imagination summons cowboy legend Pecos Bill, who helps him save the family farm from a greedy land-grabber. With the help of a lumberjack and a railroad worker, they all embark on a surprise-filled adventure.
cast: Patrick Swayze|Oliver Platt|Roger Aaron Brown|Nick Stahl|Scott Glenn|Stephen Lang|Jared Harris|Catherine O'Hara|Moira Sinise|Joe Grifasi|John P. Ryan|Scott Wilson|Bert Kramer|Eric Lawson|Bill Rodgers|Susan Barnes|John Nance|Mike Moroff|Richard Zobel|Michael J. Kosta|Timothy G. Riley|Darwyn Swalve|Jay S. York|Kevin Dotcom Brown|E.B. Myers|James Oscar Lee|Sal Jenco|Michael|Ronnie|Niko|Luke|Bell|Kit|Kaye|Violet|Dudley|Sampson|Manny|Moe|Nick|William H. Macy|Burgess Meredith|Bruce Nahin|Sean O'Kane|Kenneth Swartz|Tony Teebo
director: Director: Jeremiah S. Chechik (as Jeremiah Chechik)
title: Un cuento: El mito de Pecos Bill
